Detailed Description

Multiple file mfcc extraction.

Extracts MFCC coefficients from multiple WAVE files, and puts them into a common table

Definition at line 27 of file batch.h.

long  timeFrame 
) [private]

Adds one .wav file given by infile into the table 1 containing mfcc data records

timeFrame : Duration of audio signal (in ms) per mfcc vector
